name: Bert Gunnarsson
affiliation: New Canaan[Non-game 1]New California RepublicFollowers of the Apocalypse(formerly)[1]

topics.topic_text: You're one of the Followers of the Apocalypse?
topics.response_text: I surely am. Well, sort of. I came out from Utah about six months back, saw a need for my help here.
I give what aid and comfort I can. I have medical knowledge thanks to my time with the Followers.
Well, that's an interesting question. Among the Church, I'm called Elder Gunnarsson. The Followers call me "Doc."

topics.topic_text: What happened to your friend Nephi?
topics.response_text: I never was able to reach him. He has allowed drugs and hatred to consume him. He runs with the Fiends north of here, now. They call him Driver Nephi.

topics.topic_text: What's the deal with all these refugees?
topics.response_text: Poor lost souls, most of them. They thought to come to New Vegas and find their fortunes on its shining Strip.

topics.topic_text: What was it that brought you out here from Utah?
topics.response_text: Following a lost cause, I'm afraid. My old friend Nephi fell in with a bad crowd.
I've heard through the locals that Nephi has passed on. I truly hope his soul finds peace.
I would be happy to, should you require it. You seem to be in fine health now.
I only do what I can to help.

description:
Bert Gunnarsson is a 157 year-old Caucasian Male.

A compassionate ghoul doctor with medical training from the Followers of the Apocalypse. Having recently arrived in the Mojave about six months prior to October 2281, Bert is torn between his faith and his desire to help others, having chosen to work with the NCR at Aerotech Office Park despite the Followers' disapproval.

Bert Gunnarsson's Personality: Compassionate, determined, and principled. Bert believes in helping others regardless of factional boundaries, but still holds onto his faith and moral compass. He's willing to make difficult choices for what he perceives as the greater good.

Bert Gunnarsson's Backstory: Bert Gunnarsson was born in 1877 and lived through the Great War, becoming a ghoul. He eventually joined the Followers of the Apocalypse, dedicating his life to medical training and service. However, his friend Nephi strayed from their shared faith, falling in with a dangerous group of drug runners and raiders in Utah. Determined to bring his friend back to the fold, Bert followed westward to the Mojave Wasteland, arriving around April 2281. Despite the Followers of the Apocalypse's disapproval of working with the NCR, Bert accepted a position at their Aerotech Office Park medical facility, believing his skills could help those most affected by the ongoing conflicts in the region.
